[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.2em” transform_translate_linked=”off” custom_padding=”12px||||false|false” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wb3N0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwMyJ9fQ==@” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#AAAAAA” global_colors_info=”{}” text_text_color__hover=”#DDDDDD” text_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-8px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.2em” transform_translate_linked=”off” custom_padding=”12px||||false|false” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wb3N0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwNSJ9fQ==@” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#AAAAAA” global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-8px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” text_text_color__hover=”#DDDDDD” text_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]

8500 Series
Elevator Batch Oven

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.2em” transform_translate_linked=”off” custom_padding=”12px||||false|false” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wb3N0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwNyJ9fQ==@” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#AAAAAA” global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-8px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” text_text_color__hover=”#DDDDDD” text_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]

9500 Series
Advanced Innovation

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.1″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

The SierraThermal 9500 Series is designated as a new products category that can be whatever you want it to be.  Choose from our various transport methods, rollers, belts, or elevators, to fit whatever application you have in mind.  Consider the options we can provide for atmospheric control including air, nitrogen, or hydrogen gas and let us help you meet your process requirements with a tailor-made system.  With parts and materials of all sizes and shapes and temperature requirements ranging from 50C to 1050C, beginning with sometimes no more than a conversation, we have helped hundreds of customers go from a processing goal to a quality mass production process that they can rely on and grow with for years to come. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#efefef” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cost-effective custom applications

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.1″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

The 9500 custom thermal processing system is whatever we can work together to create.  We are interested in your ideas and want to work with you to make your production goals a reality.  We thrive on helping customers succeed in new markets with new technologies by contributing our thermal processing expertise to your project.  All thermal processing systems from SierraThermal are designed for precision processing in manufacturing operations requiring performance of the highest quality and consistency. Technologically advanced heating elements and control systems work together to create exceptionally stable temperature uniformity and repeatability throughout the process chamber. Multiple tiers of graded, power-saving insulation keep energy bills low, even at the highest processing temperatures.

SierraThermal’s innovative atmosphere distribution and management systems eliminate thermal shock. Thorough extraction of burn-off effluents across the entire chamber width keeps part yields high. Integrated burn-off condensate entrapment and collection systems inhibit process fluctuation and contamination.

SierraThermal’s exceptional HMI is included as standard equipment on the Fast Response Conveyor Furnace. Our Furnace Monitoring System (FMS) is the culmination of decades of thermal processing expertise and incorporates the latest technology in digital controls and monitoring systems. The result is a powerful yet intuitive interface with comprehensive data logging, process control, and process characterization features. On-line help and remote diagnostic tools are also available to keep the furnace performing at its peak day after day, year after year. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Applications:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Roller transport in air or controlled atmosphere

Belt transport in air or controlled atmosphere

Roll-to-roll processing

Deposition of films at atmospheric pressure on rollers or belt

Batch oven variations

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Benefits:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.3em” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Precisely distributed air introduction and exhaust insure a consistently clean and uniform atmosphere

Heating element control features maximize temperature flexibility and uniformity

Reliable transport systems accommodate a wide range of loading configurations

Many optional features available

Customizable to meet specific processing requirements

World class HMI with built in profiling, data and event logging and touchscreen interface

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Technical Data:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Maximum temperature rating:
1050° C

Heating:
IR lamps, resistive block heaters, quartz tube heaters, convective, others

Cooling:
Free and forced convection/conduction
Both air and water as standard

Process Method:
Metal mesh conveyor belt
Metal or ceramic roller
Teflon conveyor belt
Batch
Others

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_module=”517″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_color=”#B71C1C” header_text_align=”center” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_4_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px||||false|false” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#DDDDDD” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ready to learn more?

Contact our sales team: sales@s-thermal.com

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
